short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your EASY password into DIFFICULT password!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It changes the easy-to-remember password to a difficult one.
Please use the password you used, and just change the "easy word".
In case the generated password is detected, the password of the other site is safe if you use one the "easy word" changed.
If you enter the same "password", "easy word", you will always get the same result.
